code: import{Button,VStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import React from'react';import{RiAddCircleFill,RiDashboardFill,RiEyeFill,RiUser3Fill}from'react-icons/ri';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{spacing:'8',p:"16",boxShadow:'-2px 0 10px rgba(107,70,193,0.5)',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkButton,{Icon:RiDashboardFill,text:"Dashboard",url:'dashboard',active:location.pathname==='/admin/dashboard'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkButton,{Icon:RiAddCircleFill,text:"Create Course",url:'createcourse',active:location.pathname==='/admin/createcourse'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkButton,{Icon:RiEyeFill,text:"Courses",url:'courses',active:location.pathname==='/admin/courses'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkButton,{Icon:RiUser3Fill,text:"Users",url:'users',active:location.pathname==='/admin/users'})]});};export default Sidebar;function LinkButton(_ref){let{url,Icon,text,active}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin/".concat(url),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{fontSize:'larger',variant:"ghost",colorScheme:active?'purple':'',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{style:{margin:'4px'}}),text]})});}
